Xenosynth.Caching.FileCache Class Reference

The FileCache provides a simple service for caching binary data to temporary files. More...

Detailed Description

The FileCache provides a simple service for caching binary data to temporary files.

The FileCache is a utility class ot assist with storing run-time generated files (such as image thumbnails) or caching resources from external sources (such as blobs from the database).
